info.name: Dark Docs (2019)
info.description:
A style for google docs that mimics the feel of Discord. This style is not entirely finished but works for casual use.

Changelog:
- fixed white loading flash
- fixed submenu text color
- fixed white outline on right menu
- added highlight override
- made comments more visible and fixed selected comments
- fixed cursor
- fixed some buttons having no background
- fixed button hover
